/* 07-05 신희준 선임 코드 정리 및 함수 설명 주석*/ import React, { Component } from "react" import { withStyles } from "@material-ui/core" import Formsy from "formsy-react" import { OwpDialog, OwpTextField, OwpSearchTextField,OwpButton }from 'owp/wrapper'; import axios from "axios" import { mutate,query } from 'owp/api'; import moment from "moment" class Dialog_C0802005 extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { stateDialogReweighing: false } } openDialog_customer = () => { // console.log( this.props.dialogData); query({ url: "loadOwpFacilitieshis/" + this.props.dialogData["OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_SEQ"], }).then(res => { this.setState({ stateDialogReweighing: true, FAC_HIS_CLASSIFICATION : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_CLASSIFICATIONNM'], FAC_HIS_CONTENTS : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_CONTENTS'], FAC_HIS_ID : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_ID'], FAC_HIS_LOCATION : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_LOCATION'], FAC_HIS_NM : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_NM'], FAC_HIS_SEQ : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_SEQ'], FAC_HIS_PRE_METHOD : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_PRE_METHOD'], FAC_HIS_STATUS : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_STATUS'], WDATE : moment(res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.WDATE']).format("YYYY-MM-DD"), STARTTIME : moment(res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.STARTTIME']).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"), FINISHTIME : moment(res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FINISHTIME']).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"), FAC_HIS_TROUBLE_PART : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_TROUBLE_PART'], FAC_HIS_TROUBLE_TIME : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_TROUBLE_TIME'], FAC_HIS_CAUSE : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_CAUSE'], FAC_HIS_WORKER : res['OWP_FACILITIESHIS.FAC_HIS_WORKER'] }); }) .catch(error =>{ console.error(error); }) } closeDialog_customer = () => { //창닫기 this.setState({ stateDialogReweighing: false }) } render() { return (
닫기 } innerRef={ref => (this.owpDialog = ref)} > {/*
Registration Date Preservation Method History Classification Facility Name Facility No. Trouble Parts Status Cause Contents Start Time Finish Time Trouble Time Worker
*/}
{/* */}
설비/장비명 설비번호 설치장소
이력구분 보전 방식 상태
등록일 시작 시간 종료 시간

) } } export default withStyles({ withTheme: true })(Dialog_C0802005)
